LD JSON | Atur Sesuai Kebutuhan

                "@type" : "Person",
                "name" : ""

        "target": "?q={search_term_string}",
        "query-input": "required name=search_term_string"
    }
},

  "@context" : "http://schema.org/",
  "@type": "EmployerAggregateRating",
  "itemReviewed": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name" : "",
    "sameAs" : ""
  },
  "ratingValue": "91",
  "bestRating": "100",

}]












/*!
=> Theme Name: Lamp Responsive
=> Theme URI: https://www.codepelajar.com
=> Author: Code Pelajar
=> Author URI: https://www.codepelajar.com
=> Version: 1.0
=> License: Creative Commons Atribucion-NoComercial 4.0 Internacional (Template Gratis dari Code Pelajar)
=> License URI: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/
*/

body#layout::before {
    content: "Lamp Grid | Template by Code Pelajar";
    position: relative;
    padding: 14px 0;
    display: inline-block;
    width: 100%;
    font-size: 14px;
    font-family: monospace;
    background: #0389ff;
    color: #fff;
    font-weight: bold;
    top: 0;
    margin-bottom: 14px;
}
body#layout .section h4 {
    display: none;
}
body#layout .section::before {
    content: "";
    position: relative;
    display: block;
    padding: 10px;
    font-size: 14px;
    font-family: monospace;
    background: #0389ff;
    color: #fff;
}
body#layout div#Header_Brand::before {
    content: "<Site Header/>";
}

body#layout div#Header_Ads::before {
    content: "<Header Right/>";
}
body#layout div#News_Ticker::before {
    content: "<News Ticker(Do Not Edit)/>";
}
body#layout div#Banner_Ads::before {
    content: "<Banner Ads/>";
}
body#layout div#Banner_Ads_Index_Only::before {
    content: "<Banner Ads(Index Only)/>";
}
body#layout div#Blog::before {
    content: "<Main Content/>";
}
body#layout div#Sidebar_site::before {
    content: "<Sidebar(AMP)/>";
}
body#layout div#Sidebar_non_AMP::before {
    content: "<Sidebar(Non AMP)/>";
}
body#layout div#Footer_Banner_Ads::before {
    content: "<Footer Banner/>";
}
body#layout div#Footer_Banner_Ads_Index_Only::before {
    content: "<Footer Banner(Index Only)/>";
}
body#layout div#Sidebar_site::after {
    content: "Jangan Edit Sembarangan!";
    position: relative;
    display: block;
    padding: 10px 0;
    color: #fff;
    background: #db4437;
    margin-top: 14px;
    font-size: 14px;
    font-weight: bold;
}
body#layout .widget-content a {
    background: #0389ff;
    padding: 8px 10px;
    border-radius: 50px;
    color: #fff !important;
    text-decoration: none;
}
body#layout .widget-content {
    box-shadow: none !important;
}
body#layout .widget-content {
    box-shadow: none !important;
    border: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.2);
}
body#layout .draggable-widget .widget-wrap2 {
    background-color: #0389ff;
}
body#layout div.section {
    background: transparent;
    border: none;
    padding: 0px;
}
body#layout #codepelajar-header .header-top {
    display: none;
}
body#layout #codepelajar-nav {
    display: none;
}
body#layout .sosial-link {
    display: none;
}
body#layout .banner-ads {
    float: left;
    width: 50%;
}
body#layout .main-content, body#layout .codepelajar-sidebar {
    float: left;
    width: 50%;
}
body#layout .header-right, body#layout .header-bottom {
    float: left;
    width: 50%;
}
body#layout .news-ticker {
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
}
body#layout .header-left {
    float: left;
    width: 50%;
}
/* => Your Layout Styles */

/*Fix: Unnecessary elements removed*/
.widget-item-control,
.item-control.blog-admin,
.continue,.loadmore,
.thread-chrome.thread-collapsed,
.singleton-element:not(.cookie-choices-info),
.noAllowNewComments .comment-actions {display:none}

/*Fix: Show lightbox*/
.CSS_LIGHTBOX{z-index:90001}

/*Fix: Image responsive*/
a[imageanchor]:not([style*=float]) {
    margin-right: 0 ;
    margin-left: 0 ;
}
img[data-original-height],
img[data-original-width] {height: auto;}

/*Fix: Comment Editor*/
#comment-editor{
    border:0;
    width:100%;
    min-height:220px
}

/*Fix: Responsive Comments*/
.fb-comments,
.fb-comments span,
.fb-comments iframe,
.cmt_iframe_holder,
.cmt_iframe_holder iframe {
    width:100%;
    display:block;
}

/* http://meyerweb.com/eric/tools/css/reset/ 
   v2.0 | 20110126
   License: none (public domain)
*/

html, body, div, span, applet, object, iframe,
h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, p, blockquote, pre,
a, abbr, acronym, address, big, cite, code,
del, dfn, em, img, ins, kbd, q, s, samp,
small, strike, strong, sub, sup, tt, var,
b, u, i, center,
dl, dt, dd, ol, ul, li,
fieldset, form, label, legend,
table, caption, tbody, tfoot, thead, tr, th, td,
article, aside, canvas, details, embed, 
figure, figcaption, footer, header, hgroup, 
menu, nav, output, ruby, section, summary,
time, mark, audio, video {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  border: 0;
  font-size: 100%;
  font: inherit;
  vertical-align: baseline;
}
/* HTML5 display-role reset for older browsers */
article, aside, details, figcaption, figure, 
footer, header, hgroup, menu, nav, section {
  display: block;
}
body {
  line-height: 1;
}
ol, ul {
  list-style: none;
}
blockquote, q {
  quotes: none;
}
blockquote:before, blockquote:after,
q:before, q:after {
  content: '';
  content: none;
}
blockquote {
    position: relative;
    padding: 14px;
    margin: 14px 0;
    font-style: italic;
    font-size: 16px;
    color: rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
    border-left: 5px solid #0389ff;
    background-color: #f5f5f5;
}
table {
  border-collapse: collapse;
  border-spacing: 0;
}
b, strong {
    font-weight: bold;
}

/* CSS START */
/* Global */
* {
  box-sizing:border-box;
}
body {
  font-family: 'Roboto', Arial ,sans-serif;
}
a {
  text-decoration :none;
}
img {
  max-width:100%;
  height:auto;
}
i, em {
  font-style:italic;
}
table {
    border-collapse: collapse;
    border-spacing: 0;
    width: 100%;
    max-width: 100%;
    -webkit-border-horizontal-spacing: 0px;
}

table td, table th {
    border: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
    padding:5px 10px;
}
table th {
    text-align: left;
    background-color: #0389ff;
    color: #fff;
    font-weight: bold;
}

pre {
    margin: 14px 0;
    padding: 10px;
    overflow: auto;
    background: #444;
    color: rgba(255,255,255,0.8);
    border-left: 5px solid rgb(3, 137, 255);
    font-family: monospace;
    font-size: 14px;
  -webkit-user-select: all;  
  -moz-user-select: all;     
  -ms-user-select: all;      
  user-select: all;          
}
kbd {
    font-family: monospace;
    color: #1da1f2;
    border: 1px solid;
    border-radius: 3px;
    padding: 3px;
}



/* Code pelajar disini */
/* wrapper */
#codepelajar-base{display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap;width:100%;max-width:970px;margin:auto}

/* header */
#codepelajar-header{width:100%;display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap}
.header-top{position:relative;overflow:hidden;width:100%;padding:10px 0}
.header-top ul > li{display:inline-block;line-height:1.6;font-size:12px}
.header-top ul > li a{color:#444;padding:5px 10px;background:rgba(0,0,0,0.1)}
.header-left{width:30%;position:relative;overflow:hidden}
.header-brand{padding:10px 0;margin-bottom:10px;line-height:1.4}
.header-brand .title{font-size:32px;font-weight:600;color:#444}
.header-brand .title a {color:#444}
.header-brand .description{font-size:14px}
.header-right{position:relative;overflow:hidden;width:70%}
.header-bottom{position:relative;width:100%;margin:10px 0;display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap}
#codepelajar-nav{background:#0389ff;font-size:14px;width:70%;}
#codepelajar-nav ul > li{display:inline-block;line-height:1.6}
#codepelajar-nav ul > li a.home-nav {background: rgba(0,0,0,0.3);}
#codepelajar-nav ul > li a{display:inline-block;color:#fff;padding:10px 15px;transition:.3s;font-weight:600}
#codepelajar-nav ul > li a:hover{background:rgba(0,0,0,0.2)}
#codepelajar-nav ul > li > ul{display:none;position:absolute;background:#0389ff;z-index:1}
#codepelajar-nav ul > li:hover > ul{display:block}
#codepelajar-nav ul > li > ul li{display:block;min-width:150px;border-bottom:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.1)}
#codepelajar-nav ul > li > ul li a{display:inline-block;width:100%}
#codepelajar-nav ul > li > ul li ul{right:-100%;transform:translateY(-40px)}
#Search-box{width:30%;background:#0389ff;padding:5px}
#Search-box *{height:100%}
.s-input{width:100%;border:none;line-height:2;height:100%;font-size:14px;padding:0 10px;border-radius:1px;outline:none}
.s-right{display:none}


.main-content{position:relative;overflow:hidden;width:65%;margin:10px 0;}

/** INDEX **/
.amp-row{display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap}
.amp-posts{padding:0 5px 10px 5px;width:50%}
.amp-posts .amp-inner{position:relative;overflow:hidden;border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.1);padding-bottom:10px;}
.amp-posts .amp-title a{color:#444}
.amp-posts .amp-title{display:inline-block;padding:10px;font-size:16px;font-weight:600;line-height:1.2;}
.amp-posts .snippet{font-size:13px;line-height:16px;color:#888;padding:0 10px;margin-bottom:10px}
.amp-posts .amp-post-info{padding:10px;overflow:hidden;font-size:12px;position:relative;}
.amp-posts .amp-post-info i{display:none;}
.amp-posts .amp-post-info .amp-tags{float:left}
.amp-posts .amp-post-info .amp-tags a{padding:2px 4px;background:#0389ff;color:#fff;font-size:11px;border-radius:3px}
.amp-posts .amp-post-info .amp-tags a:nth-child(n+2){display:none}
.amp-posts .amp-post-info .time-info{margin-left:5px}
.amp-posts .amp-post-info .time-info a{color:rgba(0,0,0,0.7);font-size:11px}
.amp-jump{position:absolute;bottom:0;right:10px;border:1px solid;padding:8px 10px;font-size:12px;color:rgba(0,0,0,0.6);transition:.3s}
.amp-jump:hover{background: #0389ff;color: #fff;border-color: #0389ff}


/** sidebar **/
.codepelajar-sidebar{position:relative;width:35%;padding-left:5px;margin:10px 0;}
#Sidebar_site {position: sticky;top: 0;}


/* popular post */
.popular-posts ul > li{position:relative;overflow:hidden;margin-bottom:10px;padding-bottom:10px;border-bottom:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.1);font-size:14px;line-height:1.5}
.popular-posts ul > li .item-thumbnail{overflow:hidden;width:80px;margin:0 10px 10px 0;float:left}
.popular-posts ul > li .item-title a{color:rgba(0,0,0,0.8);text-decoration:none}
.popular-posts ul > li .item-title{font-size:16px;font-weight:bold;padding-bottom:10px}
.popular-posts ul > li .item-snippet{opacity:.5;font-size:12px}

.codepelajar-sidebar .widget > h2,.rel-title,.latest-title,.comment-title{position:relative;display:inline-block;padding-bottom:10px;margin-bottom:10px;font-size:14px;padding:10px 0;color:#444;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:1px;line-height:20px;border-bottom:2px solid}

/* icon kan */
.PopularPosts > h2::before {
    content: '\f005';
}
.codepelajar-sidebar .widget > h2::before{display:inline-block;font:normal normal normal 14px/1 FontAwesome;font-size:inherit;text-rendering:auto;-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased;-moz-osx-font-smoothing:grayscale}

/* footer */
#footer-site{background:#0389ff;border-top:3px solid #026ecc;width:100%;overflow:hidden}
.footer-content{position:relative;padding:10px;display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap;width:100%}
.footer-left,.footer-right{width:100%}
/* footer link */
.sosial-link{width:100%;position:relative;text-align:center;padding:10px 0}
.sosial-link ul > li{display:inline-block}
.sosial-link ul > li a{display:inline-block;padding:10px 15px;background:rgba(0,0,0,0.5);color:#fff;font-size:14px;border-radius:3px}
.attribusi{text-align:center;padding:10px 0;font-size:12px;text-transform:uppercase}
.attribusi a{color:#fff}


div#blog-pager{display:block;margin:14px 0;padding:0 10px;text-align:center;font-size:12px}
div#blog-pager a{display:inline-block;padding:5px 14px;line-height:24px;background:#0389ff;color:#fff;font-weight:bold;letter-spacing:1px;text-decoration:none;margin:1px;border-radius:3px}
div#blog-pager a:hover{opacity:.7}

/* POST ARTICLE */
.amp-article {
    padding-right: 5px;
}
/* BREAD CRUMBS */
.amp-breadcrumbs{font-size:12px;letter-spacing:1px;font-weight:600;padding:4px 0;margin:4px 0}
.amp-breadcrumbs a{color:rgba(0,0,0,0.8);text-decoration:none}
/* HEAD LINE */
.amp-article-headline{padding-bottom:14px;margin-bottom:14px;border-bottom:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.1);position:relative;overflow:hidden}
.amp-article-headline .amp-title{letter-spacing:.5px;font-size:24px;padding:10px 0;color:#fff;font-weight:600;line-height:1.5}
.amp-article-headline .amp-title a{color:rgba(0,0,0,0.8);text-decoration:none}
.amp-article-info{padding:0;font-size:12px}
.amp-article-info a{text-decoration:none;color:rgba(0,0,0,0.8)}
.amp-article-info i{margin-right:5px}
.amp-article-body{font-size:14px;padding:0;line-height:1.6;margin-bottom:10px;word-break:break-word;}
/** TEXT FORMAT **/
.amp-article-body h1,
.amp-article-body h2,
.amp-article-body h3,
.amp-article-body h4,
.amp-article-body h5,
.amp-article-body h6 {
  margin-bottom: 10px;
  font-weight:bold;
  line-height:1.2;
}
.amp-article-body h1 {
  font-size:32px;
}
.amp-article-body h2 {
  font-size:28px;
}
.amp-article-body h3 {
  font-size:24px;
}
.amp-article-body h4 {
  font-size:20px
}
.amp-article-body h5 {
  font-size:18px;
}
.amp-article-body h6 {
  font-size:16px;
}
.amp-article-body p {
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}
.amp-article-body ul, .amp-article-body ol {
    margin-left: 14px;
    padding-left: 14px;
}
.amp-article-body ul, .amp-article-body ul li {
    list-style-type: square;
    list-style: square;
}


.amp-article-body ol, .amp-article-body ol li {
    list-style: decimal;
}


.amp-share{padding:0;margin-bottom:10px}
.amp-labelizer{padding:0;margin-bottom:10px;font-size:12px;font-weight:600}
.amp-labelizer i{margin-right:5px}
.amp-labelizer .amp-label a{color:#fff;margin:1px;line-height:2;display:inline-block;padding:0 10px;background:#0d87fa;border-radius:5px}
/* comment */
.comment-wrapper{margin-bottom:10px}

/* Alert Index */
.alert{padding:10px;margin:0 10px 14px 10px;border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.3);border-radius:5px;text-align:center;font-size:14px;line-height:1.6;background:#f5f5f5}


/*** label **/
.Label{font-size:12px}
.Label .label-size{background:#0389ff;color:#fff;margin:0 0 5px 2px;display:inline-block;padding:5px 10px;border-radius:3px;font-weight:600;letter-spacing:1px;transition:.3s}
.Label a{color:#fff}
.Label .list-label-widget-content a{color:rgba(0,0,0,0.8)}
.Label .list-label-widget-content{color:rgba(0,0,0,0.8);font-size:16px;line-height:1.6}
.Label .list-label-widget-content li::before{content:"\f02b";display:inline-block;font:normal normal normal 14px/1 FontAwesome;font-size:inherit;text-rendering:auto;-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased;-moz-osx-font-smoothing:grayscale;margin-right:10px}
.Label .list-label-widget-content a:hover{opacity:.5;transition:.3s}
.Label .list-label-widget-content li{position:relative;border-bottom:2px dashed rgba(0,0,0,0.1);padding:5px 0}

/*** SHARE **/
#share_btnper{margin:14px auto;padding:0}
.share_btn{position:relative;margin:0;padding:0;display:block;overflow:hidden}
.share_btn ul,ul .showother{position:relative;margin:0;padding:0;font-size:12px}
.share_btn ul li{float:left;display:inline-block;overflow:hidden}
.share_btn li a,.shareplus{color:#fff;padding:0;width:40px;display:block;text-align:center;height:35px;line-height:35px;transition:all 0.25s;margin:0 5px 5px 0;text-transform:uppercase;letter-spacing:1px;border-radius:4px;overflow:hidden}
.share_btn ul li span{padding:0;margin:0}
.share_btn i{font-size:16px;padding:0;margin:0;line-height:35px;text-align:center}
.shareplus{padding:0;background:#bdc3c7;cursor:pointer}
.share_btn li a.fb i,.share_btn li a.tw i{width:20px;text-align:left}
.share_btn a:hover{background:#333;color:#fff}
.share_btn li a.fb{background:#4867aa;padding:0 35px;width:auto}
.share_btn li a.tw{background:#1da1f2;padding:0 35px;width:auto}
.share_btn li a.gp{background:#dc4a38}
.share_btn li a.pt{background:#ca2128}
.share_btn li a.le{background:#0673ab}
.share_btn li a.tr{background:#43556e}
.share_btn li a.em{background:#141b23}
.share_btn li a.ln{background:#00c300}
.share_btn li a.bm{background:#000}
.share_btn li a.wa{background:#4dc247}
.share_btn li a:hover,.shareplus:hover{-webkit-filter:grayscale(100%)}
/* Item Responsive */
@media screen and (max-width:768px){#main-wrapper{padding:0}.share_btn li a.fb,.share_btn li a.tw{padding:0 37px}ul#relpost_img_sum li{width:47.7%}}
@media screen and (max-width:640px){.share_btn li a.fb,.share_btn li a.tw{padding:0 25px}}
@media screen and (max-width:320px){.share_btn ul li a.fb,.share_btn ul li a.tw{padding:0 14px}}


@media (max-width:970px){
  #codepelajar-base {
    padding: 0 10px;
  }
}
@media (max-width:768px){
  .header-left, .header-right, .main-content, .codepelajar-sidebar {
    width:100%;
  }
}
@media (max-width:640px){
  #codepelajar-nav{
    width:100%;
  }
  #Search-box {
    width:100%;
    height :40px;
  }
}
@media (max-width:525px){
  .amp-posts {
    padding: 0 0 20px 0;
    width: 100%;
  }
}

/** IKLAN **/
.banner-ads{position:relative;width:100%;overflow:hidden}
.iklan-dalam{position:relative;width:100%;overflow:hidden}

.news-ticker {
    width: 100%;
    font-size: 14px;
}
div#PopularPosts99 {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
}
div#PopularPosts99 > h2 {
    width: 15%;
}
.news-ticker-main {
    width: 85%;
    overflow: hidden;
}
.news-ticker-main > marquee > ul > li {
    display: inline-block;
    margin-right: 20px;
    padding-right: 10px;
    border-right: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.8);
}

.news-ticker-main > marquee > ul > li a {
    color: rgba(0,0,0,0.8);
}

      var disqus_shortname = "",
          disqus_config = function(){
             this.page.url = "";
             this.page.title = "";
          };//
       (function() {
           var d = document, s = d.createElement('script');
           s.async = true;
           s.src = '//' + disqus_shortname + '.disqus.com/embed.js';
           s.setAttribute('data-timestamp', +new Date());
           (d.head || d.body).appendChild(s);
       })();//
